Package cisc275.group3.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LinkDynamics
    Simple interface for controllers/models that require an update on every tick of the timer.
    LinkTime
    Simple interface for controllers/models that require a time update every second.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ControllerBay
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneBay.java.
    ControllerBeach
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneBeach.java.
    ControllerBeachMini
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneBeachMini.java.
    ControllerDemoBay
    Demonstration controller.
    ControllerEndGame
    The EndGame controller is responsible for both the "model" and control of the endgame state.
    ControllerHQ
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneHQ.java.
    ControllerInventory
    The Inventory controller is responsible for both the "model" and control of the inventory.
    ControllerMap
    The Map controller is responsible for both the "model" and control of the map.
    ControllerMission
    The Mission controller deals with the controller aspect of missions.
    ControllerOverlay
    Responsible for creating the interface overlay buttons/labels, and adding them to the main JLayeredPane (from GameWindow.java).
    ControllerScene
    Abstract controller class for scene logic and actions.
    ControllerTitle
    The Title Controller is responsible for the control of the title screen.
    ControllerTools
    The Tools controller is responsible for both the "model" and control of the toolbox.
    ControllerTutorial
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneBay.java.
    ControllerWetland
    Contains the controller actions and logic for SceneBay.java.
    GameController
    The main controller class.
Author:
Group 3
